action.description: The committee on PBS recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) Iwamoto, Ichiyama, Poepoe, Shimizu; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Belatti, Souza;  Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Hashem, Lamosao, Morikawa, Woodson.
